participant_1.background:
I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.
My dream in life is to work from home.
I faint at the sight of blood.
I have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games.

participant_2.background:
I have two grown children who never visit.
I fantasize about taking over the world.
I am a 56 year old woman.
I used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.
I used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking for someone to play roleplaying games with.
I'm interested! I used to play a lot when I was younger, but I haven't had much time lately.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like all kinds of games, but I'm especially fond of fantasy games.
Me too! I love creating my own characters and exploring different worlds.
Me too! It's so much fun to be able to escape from reality for a little while.
Exactly! I think roleplaying games are a great way to relax and have fun.
I agree! I'm excited to play with you.
Me too! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun.
I hope so! I'm ready to start whenever you are.
Great! I'll send you a link to the game we're going to play.
